sentences.en: A trainee can become competent in scribing more quickly than in pen and ink work.
sentences.cn: 初学者掌握刻图技术,要她用绘图笔蘸墨图更为迅速.

sentences.en: A trainee is to come for training alone, without his family.
sentences.cn: 受训人员来培训不得带家属.

sentences.en: During their placement they will be paid a trainee wage.
sentences.cn: 在养老院工作期间﹐员们会被支付培训人员级别的工资.

sentences.en: Going back five years, he was still a trainee.
sentences.cn: 倒退5年, 他只是个学徒.

sentences.en: Instruct training practice and the safety of the trainee.
sentences.cn: 指导实践培训,确保学员安全.

sentences.en: Network with training community and coordinate Graduate Trainee programs.
sentences.cn: 与培训组织合作,协调大学毕业生培训项目.

sentences.en: Our actual expenses for each trainee are much higher.
sentences.cn: 我们对每一位受训人员的实际支出要高得多.

sentences.en: The trainee foxed the arrogant instructor a knotty problem.
sentences.cn: 那位受训的队员故意用难题把傲慢的教练“搞”糊涂.

sentences.en: The trainee foxed the arrogant instructor with a knotty problem.
sentences.cn: 那位受训的队员故意用难题把傲慢的教练搞糊涂.

sentences.en: To train tradesmen and trainee in their repair activities.
sentences.cn: 在修理工作中给技工和学徒提供培训和指导.

sentences.en: Trainee commandos are put through an exhausting assault course.
sentences.cn: 受训的突击队员要参加令人筋疲力尽的突击课程.

sentences.en: Trainee manager Program is the cradle for our program manager.
sentences.cn: 储备经理是我们培养和发展项目经理的摇篮.

sentences.en: Trainee nurses have to work for some weeks in maternity.
sentences.cn: 受训的护士必须在产科病房工作数周.

sentences.en: Users can have access as administrator, trainer or trainee.
sentences.cn: 用户可以以管理员 、 教员或学员的身份登录.

sentences.en: We are a member of Sino - Japan Trainee Cooperation Organization of China.
sentences.cn: 中国中日研修生协力机构的会员.

words.tran_cn: 培训；训练过的，受过培训的
助理教练；训练员；驯马师；飞行练习器
[经管]练习生，实习生；受训者；新兵；训练中的动物

trans.tran_cn: 受训练的人[动物]，新兵，练习生，实习生
trans.tran_en: someone who is being trained for a job
